name: kosmos-styleguide
description: A css/js style framework for KOSMoS. Based on bootstrap 4.6.
author: Elena Schediwie eschediwie@inovex.de

scripts.css-compile: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/ -o dist/css/
scripts.css-minify: cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap.min.css dist/css/bootstrap.css && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-grid.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-grid.css && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.min.css dist/css/bootstrap-reboot.css
scripts.css-watch: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map true --source-map-contents true --precision 6 scss/ -wo dist/css/
scripts.js-test-karma-bundle-old: cross-env BUNDLE=true USE_OLD_JQUERY=true npm run js-test-karma
scripts.lockfile-lint: lockfile-lint --allowed-hosts npm --allowed-schemes https: --empty-hostname false --type npm --path package-lock.json
scripts.update-deps: ncu -u -x "jquery,karma-browserstack-launcher,sinon,terser" && npm update && echo Manually update site/assets/js/vendor
scripts.release-zip: cross-env-shell "rm -rf bootstrap-$npm_package_version-dist && cp -r dist/ bootstrap-$npm_package_version-dist && zip -r9 bootstrap-$npm_package_version-dist.zip bootstrap-$npm_package_version-dist && rm -rf bootstrap-$npm_package_version-dist"
scripts.test: npm-run-all lint dist js-test docs-build docs-lint
scripts.netlify: cross-env-shell HUGO_BASEURL=$DEPLOY_PRIME_URL npm-run-all dist release-sri docs-build
scripts.watch-css-main: nodemon --watch scss/ --ext scss --exec "npm-run-all css-lint css-compile css-prefix"
